title: How to Hire and Grow Developers
subtitle: Practical hiring masterclass for fast-growing companies.
keywords: hiring, recuriting, how to hire developers, how to recruit developers, where to find developers
metaDescription: In this 2-day intensive, practical, and high-energy training course, you will learn how to find, attract, interview, motivate, and retain software developers in your company.
description: In this 2-day intensive, practical, and high-energy training course, you will learn how to find, attract, interview, motivate, and retain software developers in your company.
audience: Developers, recruiters, and hiring managers that want to stand out and win over in the crazy hiring race.
certification: Yes, you'll earn a certificate of accomplishment.
language: The course is taught in English.
